page.title: 19Activities
page.content: There are many clubs and activities for children and adults in Gnosall. I belong to the cubs and I belong to the Dragon Pack. At the moment we are doing first aid. Last Wednesday we played rounders against Lion Pack and we won. At cubs we make all sorts of things, knots, dragons for St. George's Day, bird boxes. The Gnosall Division of the St. John's Ambulance meets on Monday nights for cadets and juniors. Adults meet on Thursdays. You learn first aid and nursing and how to cope in an emergency. You provide first aid cover at local functions. Women's Institute meetings are held once a month in the village hall. There may be a guest speaker, a bring and buy stall and a competion. Members take it in turns to serve tea and biscuits at the monthly meetings.
